titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN MODIFICATION INDICATOR FOR DOSE REDUCTION - Description

body.p: An indication of whether the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Regimen was modified by reducing the dose of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy drug administered, at any point after commencement of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Regimen .
